title.rendered: Handyman Connection Recognized on Qualified Remodeler’s 2018 Home Improvement Pro Top 200 List

content.rendered:
We’re excited to share that we’ve placed #34 on Qualified Remodeler’s 2018 Home Improvement Pro (HIP) Top 200 List. The HIP Top 200 list recognizes the top 200 home improvement companies based on revenue. Handyman Connection’s expertise in a variety of services from traditional home repairs to remodeling, coupled with increased expansion efforts, contributed to the accomplishment. In addition, the hard work of Handyman’s dedicated franchisees and staff has helped the company achieve significant momentum this year and we’re looking forward to an even better 2019!

The premier publication serving remodelers and home improvement companies in the United States, Qualified Remodeler has tracked the industry’s largest and most successful companies since 1978. Additional information on the HIP Top 200 can be found in the November issue of Qualified Remodeler and at qualifiedremodeler.com/2018-hip-200.

For more information on Handyman Connection and to receive a free service quote, visit www.handymanconnection.com.
